name: Kyung Hee Cyber University
description: Kyung Hee Cyber University (KHCU), established in 2001, aims to nurture competent leaders who may contribute to the construction of a cultural welfare society through theory and practice based on on-going research, all culminating in the creation of an ideal society for mankind for the common civilization. Currently about 9,000 students pursue their dreams in 5 Schools with 18 Departments. Students show high level of satisfaction with 100% in-house produced e-learning contents made in accordance with global standard. KHCU was evaluated as 2007 Best Online University by the Ministry of Education. For the students worldwide, we provide multi-language contents. The Global campus, the KHCU Study Halls, opened wide for its sister universities in Vietnam, Mongolia, the Philippines India, Thailand, the United States and Canada provide their students with convenient access to our online lectures.
